data.name: OF2 - Scarlett: Donation DLC
data.detailed_description:
NEW GAME

ADD OUR NEW UPCOMING GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1736840/From_Paris_with_Love_Passion_with_view/


NEW GAME

ADD OUR NEW UPCOMING GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1791890/From_Paris_with_Love_2_Passion_with_view/


About the Game

THIS IS A DONATION DLC


NSFW18 Games is an indie game studio making lewd games 24/7!
This DLC is offered to all the members of the Lewd Tribe (ak Patrons).
PLEASE PURCHASE THIS DLC ONLY IF YOU WANT TO SUPPORT US!

This donation DLC gives you access to few extra rewards:

CALENDAR

Get your 2022 OnlyFuck Calendar directly in the folder of the game to print or to use as wallpaper.

OUTFITS

  • One extra outfit "naked" directly unlocked for FREE in the game.
  • One extra outfit "hosiery" available in the shop (selected by the community as the sexiest outfit).

LOVE ROOM

  • Love Room upgrades cost -20%.

SHOP

  • All elements of the shop -20%.

ONLYFUCK Specials

  • All OnlyFuck upgrades cost -20%.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7-8-10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6 or lower
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Tested on Ubuntu 18.04 / Manjaro / Arch Linux
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content including posing, sex act, masturbation, duo and cosplay (Only consensual sex).
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old
